oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. Virgil Metcalf to his mother
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Metcalf, Co. A, 47th Engineer Battn., consistently corresponds with his mother while in service. Metcalf writes his mother that the war is winding down and he hopes to be home soon. He was from McMinn County, Tennessee and his mother was living in Maryville. His unit became a transporation unit and served in France from July, 1918 to June, 1919.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
